name: chris wallace

text: The order and pickup were disappointing, but they did give me a coupon to make up for the issues. And in all fairness. This location is bgh usually pretty good.

text: Made my pizza wrong but made it right by making new one and giving me the wrong one free, fast service anyhow

name: Matt Battaglia
text: Correy took my order and I believe was the only one there at the time and the pizza came out perfect, was very pleased with the service and the taste of the pizza!

name: Mackenzie Harwoood
text: Waited 3 hours for pizza while starving and then they called and said there was a mistake and that I could come in and pick it up if I wanted. Terrible service. I'll never purchase anything from papa johns ever again.

text: Great food and decent prices
